remarks: Meet preservation of the reverse mapping between the two sublattices in Lemma 1.3 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 2.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Apr-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:

mdslj2i $p |- ( ( ( A MH B /\ B MH* A ) /\ ( ( A i^i B ) C_ ( C i^i D ) /\ ( C vH D ) C_ B ) ) -> ( ( C i^i D ) vH A ) = ( ( C vH A ) i^i ( D vH A ) ) ) $.
